name: Now That's What I Call Games
overview: Now That's What I Call Games is a compilation of 100 public domain and shareware games for the Amiga CD32 and CDTV. The games included are: Air Ace II ("Air Ace 2") AMasterMind ("Amastermind1.1") Amigatration Arena Assault Baldy: The Search for Missing Disks ("Baldy") Battle Cars ("Battlecar") Battleship! ("Battleships") Siege of the Beast ("Beast") Bomb Jacky Bop'n'Plop Amiga GnuChess ("Chess") China Challenge ("China") Clue ("Cludo") Copper Cow Wars Crave Crazy Pipes XFire ("Crossfire") CrossMaze 4'n-row 3D ("Cube 4") Cubus Double Squares ("Dbl SQA"/"Dbl-Sqr") Deathbringers From Space ("Deathbringer") Desert Defender Diamond Thief! ("Diamond") Diplomacy DragonTiles DriveWars Smash Bang Wallop! ("Driving Game") Elevation Fruit Panic Furmyre Galaga '92 ("Galaga") Grav Attack GX-200 Headgames! Hollywood Trivia ("Hollywood") Insectoids 2 Amoeba Invaders ("Invaders") Leedings Legend of Lothian ("Lothian") Maiyessae Mega Race Megaball MirrorWars Missile Command Parker Brother's Monopoly ("Monopoly") Mosaic Motherlode Mr Wobbly Leg Versus The Invaders From Space ("Mr. Wobbly") Nova Numpty and the Alien Invaders("Numpty") Pac-Atac ("Pac Atttack") PacSim Parachute Joust ("Parachute") Poing Premier Picks Quick Money Raid III: Total Fire ("Raid 3") Rebound Return to Earth Reversi Revolution Rocky Clone Roton Roulette Running Serene: Next Raid ("Serene") Serene III: The Final Battle ("Serene 3") Silverblade SkyFlyer II: The Battle Continue's... ("Skyflyer") Smash Telly SmurfHUNT Amiga Solitaire ("Solitaire") Solitaire X Space Attack Space Attack 2 Spectrum Spider StarTrek Shoot 1 Star Trek: The Arcade Game ("Stshoot") Sub Attack Tank Tiles Tom Cat Tsch Turbo Vektor Velcro Grub Arcade Volleyball ("Volleyball") Warrior WellTrix ("Weltrix") Wots Its Name ("Whats In A Name") Wizzy's Quest ("Wizzy Quest") WordHai Yum. Yum. Zerberk Zerg Zolyx
